title: Monster fish
creator_credit: AFTRS, Matthew Duchesne and Polly Seddon
brief_description: A young girl, Alex (Jasmine Pease), struggles to understand her parent’s divorce and as her confusion mounts her obsession with stray animals, particularly fish, flourishes. As Alex develops a caring sensibility for her pet fish, she’s able to move on past her hurt to being a child once again.
